node.content: Employment income. Box 14 of all T4 slips.
Commissions included on line 101. Box 42 of all T4 slips.
Wage loss replacement contributions. See line 101 in the guide.
Other employment income.
Old age security pension. Box 18 of the T4A(OAS) slip.
Canada pension plan or Quebec pension plan benefits. Box 20 of the T4A(P) slip.
Disability benefits included on line 114. Box 16 of the T4A(P) slip.
Other pensions and superannuation. See line 115 in the guide and complete the Worksheet for Schedule 1 for line 314.
Elected split-pension amount. Get and complete Form T1032.
Universal child care benefit. See the RC62 slip.
Universal child care benefit amount designated to a dependant.
Employment insurance and other benefits. Box 14 of the T4E slip.
Taxable amount of dividends, eligible and other than eligible, from taxable Canadian corporations. Complete the Worksheet for the return.
Taxable amount of dividends other than eligible dividends, included on line 120, from taxable Canadian corporations.
Interest and other investment income. Complete the Worksheet for the return.
Net partnership income. Limited or non-active partners only.
Registered disability savings plan income. Box 131 of the T4A slip.
Rental income. Gross.
Rental income. Net.
Taxable capital gains. Complete Schedule 3.
Support payments received. Total.
Support payments received. Taxable amount.
Registered retirement savings plan income from all T4RSP slips.
Other income. Specify.
Other income.
Self-employment income. Business income. Gross.
Self-employment income. Business income. Net.
Self-employment income. Professional income. Gross.
Self-employment income. Professional income. Net.
Self-employment income. Commission income. Gross.
Self-employment income. Commission income. Net.
Self-employment income. Farming income. Gross.
Self-employment income. Farming income. Net.
Self-employment income. Fishing income. Gross.
Self-employment income. Fishing income. Net.
Workers' compensation benefits. Box 10 of the T5007 slip.
Social assistance payments.
Net federal supplements. Box 21 of the T4A(OAS) slip.
Add lines 144, 145, and 146. See line 250 on this return. Instance 1.
Add lines 144, 145, and 146. See line 250 on this return. Instance 2.
This is your total income. Add lines 101, 104 to 143, and 147.
Enter your total income from line 150.
Pension adjustment. Box 52 of all T4 slips and box 034 of all T4A slips.
Registered pension plan deduction. Box 20 of all T4 slips and box 032 of all T4A slips.
Registered retirement savings plan and pooled registered pension plan deduction. See Schedule 7 and attach receipts.
Pooled registered pension plan employer contributions. Amount from your pooled registered pension plan contribution receipts.
Deduction for elected split-pension amount. Get and complete Form T1032.
Annual union, professional, or like dues. Receipts and box 44 of all T4 slips.
Universal child care benefit repayment. Box 12 of all RC62 slips.
Child care expenses. Get and complete Form T778.
Disability supports deduction. Get and complete Form T929.
Business investment loss. Gross.
Business investment loss. Allowable deduction.
Moving expenses. Get and complete Form T1-M.
Support payments made. Total.
Support payments made. Allowable deduction.
Carrying charges and interest expenses. Complete the Worksheet for the return.
Deduction for Canada pension plan or Quebec pension plan contributions on self-employment and other earnings. Complete Schedule 8 or get and complete Form RC381, whichever applies.
Exploration and development expenses. Get and complete Form T1229.
Other employment expenses.
Clergy residence deduction. Get and complete Form T1223.
Other deductions. Specify.
Other deductions.
Add lines 207 to 224, 229, 231, and 232. Instance 1.
Add lines 207 to 224, 229, 231, and 232. Instance 2.
This is your net income before adjustments. Line 150 minus line 233. If negative, enter 0.

Social benefits repayment. If you reported income at line 119 and the amount at line 234 is greater than $64,625, see the repayment chart on the back of your T4E slip. If you reported income on lines 113 or 146, and the amount at line 234 is greater than $75,910, complete the chart for line 235 on the Worksheet for the return. Otherwise, enter 0.
This is your net income. Line 234 minus line 235. If negative, enter 0.
Canadian Forces personnel and police deduction. Box 43 of all T4 slips.
Security options deductions.
Other payments deduction. Claim the amount from line 147, unless it includes an amount at line 146. If so, see line 250 in the guide.
Limited partnership losses of other years.
Non-capital losses of other years.
Net capital losses of other years.
Capital gains deduction. Get and complete Form T657.
Northern residents deductions. Get and complete Form T2222.
Additional deductions. Specify.
Additional deductions.
Add lines 244 to 256. Instance 1.
Add lines 244 to 256. Instance 2.
This is your taxable income. Line 236 minus line 257. If negative, enter 0.
Net federal tax. Enter the amount from line 61 of Schedule 1. Attach Schedule 1, even if the result is 0.
Canada pension plan contributions payable on self-employment and other earnings. Complete Schedule 8 or get and complete Form RC381, whichever applies.
Employment insurance premiums payable on self-employment and other eligible earnings. Complete Schedule 13.
Social benefits repayment. Amount from line 235.
Provincial or territorial tax. Attach Form 428, even if the result is 0.
This is your total payable. Add lines 420, 421, 430, 422, and 428.
Total income tax deducted. Amounts from all Canadian slips.
Refundable Quebec abatement. See line 440 in the guide.
Canada pension plan overpayment. See line 308 in the guide.
Employment insurance overpayment. See line 312 in the guide.
Refundable medical expense supplement. Complete the Worksheet for the return.
Working income tax benefit. Complete Schedule 6.
Refund of investment tax credit. Get and complete Form T2038(IND).
Part XII.2 trust tax credit. Box 38 of all T3 slips and box 209 of all T5013 slips.
Employee and partner goods and services tax/harmonized sales tax rebate. Get and complete Form GST370.
Eligible educator school supply tax credit. Supplies expenses. Maximum $1,000.
Line 468 multiplied by fifteen percent.
Tax paid by instalments.
Provincial or territorial credits. Complete Form 479 if it applies.
These are your total credits. Add lines 437 to 457, and 469 to 479. Instance 1.
These are your total credits. Add lines 437 to 457, and 469 to 479. Instance 2.
This is your refund or balance owing. Line 435 minus line 482.
Refund.
Balance owing.
